item.name: A Game of Thrones
item.description: Put simply, A Game of Thrones is one of the most frightening books ever written.

item.name: The Fellowship of the Ring
item.description: One ring rules them all. The Dark Lord put all of his powers in One Ring that was taken from him.

item.name: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
item.description: The land where children tumble out of a wardrobe, a secret country where only Lucy, Peter, Susan, and Edmund are known.

item.name: The Bloody Chamber
item.description: Shirley Jackson gets a lot of (well-deserved) love and respect these days as a major talent in midcentury fantasy and mystery, but we should spare a thought for the criminally underappreciated Angela Carter.

item.name: Carrie
item.description: There are many incredible Stephen King novels, but Carrie was his first and remains our favorite.
